meta.note: All players checked against latest depth charts, injury reports, and preview/fantasy articles as of 2025-11-30.

qbs.name: C.J. Stroud
qbs.matchup_note: Returning from absence vs. Colts — likely conservative game script in a low-scoring divisional tilt.
qbs.why: Stroud is trending to start and the matchup vs. the Colts remains fairly tight — expect volume but modest ceiling.

qbs.name: Brock Purdy
qbs.matchup_note: Likely modest aerial game vs. tough Browns front — run game may dominate for 49ers.
qbs.why: The matchup is projected as low-scoring and the 49ers tend to lean run-heavy against strong fronts per recent prop guides.

qbs.name: Jacoby Brissett
qbs.matchup_note: Downfield volume possible if hot — but uncertain continuity given recent team turbulence in Tampa Bay secondary.
qbs.why: With 49ers–Browns and Rams–Panthers expected to be more run-heavy, preview articles highlight this game (ARI @ TB) as a spot where passing volume could spike Week 13.

qbs.name: Matthew Stafford
qbs.matchup_note: Potential shootout-like script; Carolina's defense vulnerable to veteran QBs downfield.
qbs.why: Prop-bet writers highlight Rams-Panthers as a game with upside for passing volume and TDs given Carolina's defensive struggles vs. the pass.

sources.name: Week 13 NFL props & best bets – RotoWire

rbs.name: Jonathan Taylor
rbs.matchup_note: Workhorse back vs. Texans — likely high volume if Colts get ahead early.
rbs.why: Pre-game previews view Taylor as the Colts' lead back and likely focal point against a middling Texans run defense.

rbs.name: Chuba Hubbard
rbs.matchup_note: Backfield likely active in what could be ground-heavy scripts given Panthers' unpredictable pace.
rbs.why: Prop previews note Carolina's run game usage this week could spike, making a mid-tier back like Hubbard worth a look.

wrs.name: Nico Collins
wrs.matchup_note: Top target in Houston against a Colts defense likely focused on stopping run and short passes.
wrs.why: Passing game may lean on single primary target — Collins stands out as the most reliable WR for Stroud in this matchup.

sources.name: NFL Week 13 Expert Picks – CBS Sports & SportsLine

wrs.name: Trey McBride
wrs.matchup_note: Likely top offensive weapon for Cardinals if they air it out vs. uneven Tampa Bay secondary.
wrs.why: Pre-week props highlight Cardinals pass-catchers as reasonable value given potential volume and defensive matchup.
